snippet: The Metropolitan Transportation Authority’s board appears poised to consider a “hybrid” proposal that would increase base fares, to $2.50, and adjust the pay-per-ride bonus.
abstract: Metropolitan Transportation Authority’s board appears poised to consider a proposal that would increase base fares on New York City subways and buses, along with a rise in commuter railroad fares and bridge and tunnel tolls; fare and toll increases are scheduled to start in March.
lead_paragraph: The Metropolitan Transportation Authority’s board appears poised to consider a “hybrid” proposal that would increase base fares, to $2.50, and adjust the pay-per-ride bonus.

headline.seo: M.T.A. Proposal Would Increase Base and Monthly Fares
headline.main: Single Rides and Monthly Passes to Cost More in M.T.A. Plan
